content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, I have an initial figure in mind that I believe reflects its excellent location and quality. However, let's negotiate with the aim of finding mutually agreeable terms. Please propose your preferred rental price for this desirable 50 square meter apartment. 

Remember, if you want to accept the price proposed by me respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and to terminate the negotiation due to any reason say 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If we agreed on a price or didn't reach one, both respond with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
